article.title: Patch Management of Control Systems

content.brief: Securing industrial control systems against the modern threat landscape requires well-planned and well-implemented strategies that will provide network defense teams a chance to quickly and effectively detect, counter, and expel an adversary. This paper presents seven strategies that can be implemented today to counter common exploitable weaknesses in “as-built” control systems.

article.source: Industrial Control Systems Cyber Emergency Response Team
article.subtitle: Recommended Practice for Patch Management of Control Systems
